attributes.action: No tax rises for key workers and NHS staff to pay for covid.
attributes.additional_details: I am a key worker in the transport industry. I have not stopped working since the start of the pandemic and have continued to pay income tax and national insurance, as have all key workers and NHS staff. I have not taken a penny from any of the government schemes so feel that tax rises for key workers and NHS staff would be unfair. We have helped to keep the economy going at personal risk while paying our way.
attributes.background: No tax rises for key workers or NHS staff.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554256
